# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of SmartMate-AI-AI-Powered-Browser-Extension very seriously. If you have discovered a security vulnerability, please report it to us as soon as possible.

### How to Report

1.  **DO NOT** disclose the vulnerability publicly. This includes posting on GitHub issues, social media, or other public forums.
2.  Send an email to `chirag127@users.noreply.github.com` with the subject line: "Security Vulnerability Report".
3.  In your email, please include:
    *   A clear description of the vulnerability.
    *   Steps to reproduce the vulnerability, including any relevant code snippets or environment details.
    *   The affected version(s) of the extension.
    *   Any potential impact of the vulnerability.
    *   If you have a proposed solution or mitigation, please include it.

### Our Commitment

We will acknowledge your report within **48 hours**. We will investigate the reported vulnerability and will work with you to resolve it as quickly as possible. We aim to provide a fix and release an update. We will also credit you for your responsible disclosure once the vulnerability is resolved and publicly disclosed.

### Supported Versions

We actively support the latest stable release of the extension. Vulnerabilities found in older, unsupported versions may not be addressed.

### Scope

This security policy applies to all components and services directly associated with the `SmartMate-AI-AI-Powered-Browser-Extension` repository, hosted at `https://github.com/chirag127/SmartMate-AI-AI-Powered-Browser-Extension`.

Thank you for helping keep SmartMate-AI-AI-Powered-Browser-Extension secure!
